name: MyTweetLinks
author: Jordan Lyall

sections.description:
Be Tweet-worthy!

Your blog post’s key facts become easy to share Twitter links.

The MyTweetLinks plugin for WordPress increases Twitter traffic by letting your readers easily share your blog’s main points.
sections.installation:
1. Download the plugin from this page and extract it

  2. Copy the mytweetlinks folder to the “/wp-content/plugins/” directory

  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

  4. You are done â€“ you can now customize it however you want by clicking on “MyTweetLinks” in the “settings” section.
sections.faq: If you have any questions, we’d love to hear from you. Email us: jordan.lyall+mtl@gmail.com
sections.changelog:
MyTweetLinks v1.1.1 – 4/9/2012

  • Added documentation in the plugin options on how to add shortcode in a theme file

  • Fixed bug where a tweet with an apostrophe (‘) were getting cut off in the post panel

MyTweetLinks v1.1 – 3/22/2012

  • Added a shortcode as an implementation option

  • Enhanced descriptions for admin options
